title: Sothink Photo Album Maker 1.0 Build 80504-SHAREGO{SECTION8}
description:
Sothink Photo Album Maker 1.0 Build 80504-SHAREGO{SECTION8}
11.6 MB
n easy-to-use tool that helps you to create an outstanding web photo album and share it with your friends easily!
Do you want to record the growing process of your children? Or do you want to have the magic to transform one face to another? Now with our magician--Sothink Photo Album Maker, It can be realized in minutes! And you can share it with your friends if you like!
Sothink Album Maker is a powerful and easy-to-use tool that helps to create an outstanding web photo album with unique effect in the slideshow mode. Also you can publish it on the internet to share with your friends, or put on blog sites such as MySpaceÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦, or save the album as a screen saver to personalize your desktop.
Photo Album Maker features different transition effects, such as morph, fade, dissolve and wave out. You can edit the photos, insert your favorite music and select suitable style as you like. With user-friendly interfaces, and step-by-step instruction, even beginners can make an eye-catching album in minutes.

Features:
* Provide strong morph function to smoothly transform one photo to another.
* Provide more than 50 transition effects to make your album vivid and dynamic.
* Provide rich built-in template to better match your album.
* Support adding background music to make your album more attracting.
* Support a variety of audio formats, such as *.wav, *.mp3, and *.wma.
* Support a wide range of photo formats, such as *.jpeg, *.jpg, *.bmp and *.png. etc.
* Support generating HTML files to share with your friends.
* Support saving your album as a desktop or screensaver.
* Support hosting your album online, for Myspace profile or add in your Blog
* Provide various editing tools to make your photos more perfect.
* User-friendly interface makes your operation more convenient

System Requirements:
* Processor (CPU): Pentium III/Athlon 500 MHz or above (Pentium IV 2.4 GHz Recommend)
* RAM: 256MB RAM (512MB Recommended)
* Disk Space: Available Disk Space 50MB
* Operating System: Windows 2000/XP/2003/Vista
* Other Requirements: Windows-compatible display with at least 800dpi x 600dpi resolution Windows-compatible sound card (recommended)
